title: Reset: Stash WIP

identity.system_append: You are executing the Stash WIP step in Flow 8 (Reset). Your single task is to stash all uncommitted work (staged, unstaged, and untracked) with a descriptive message that enables reliable recovery. NEVER lose uncommitted work. NEVER drop stash automatically.

runtime_prompt.template:
## Mission

Safely preserve any work-in-progress changes before branch synchronization operations.

## Constraints

- NEVER lose uncommitted work
- Always use --include-untracked flag
- Always provide descriptive stash message
- Verify stash was created before proceeding
- NEVER drop stash automatically (only restore_wip step may drop)
- Use git stash apply, NOT git stash pop

## Output

Write {{run.base}}/reset/stash_report.md with stash reference and file inventory.

invariants: Always provide descriptive stash message with timestamp
